Summary: Red glowing lights over the horizon
trends: There have been no other sightings in Nakina
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsit was a thursday night and my brothe(14) and my self (16 years old) were on our way home from a junior varsity football game at my high school and it was around 9 pm or shortly afterwards when i was less than a mile from home and pulled over to shine my spotlight at deer when my brother noticed the lights first it was a single red\orange glowing circle above the tree tops off in the distance and then it just hovered there for a few seconds and then disappered and within 5-10 seconds after that the light came back more to my right then another lit up and then another in a line one by one. i was so schocked i just stared and reached for my phone to take a picture but in the process the lights went away. this isn't the first time we've noticed these light it was about the fourth time and the times before this we just though they were airplanes but the common thing about it was the dates and times. they were all on a thursday nights around 9pm in the same south\se direction
